column4: what is the difference between Ubunto 7.10 and Ubunto 6.06 LTS ?
what is the difference between Ubunto 7.10 and Ubunto 6.06 LTS ?
6.06 is the LTS edition, supported for 3 years on the desktop and 5 on the server.  7.10 does not have that same support length.
The version numbers are the release date, i.e: 2006/6th month and 2007/10th month
